Judul: Tumor Biology Center Freiburg, Germany From molecular biology to supportive careMeat Science and Muscle Biology: Novel Technologies in Muscle Biology/Fresh Meat Research
Abstrak:
t Tumor Biology Center
Freiburg is the only private cancer
research center in Germany. There are
two hospitals, one each for cancer
rehabilitation and medical oncology,
and also two institutes focusing on
cancer research. Anticancer drug development is the major research goal
of the Center. Scientific evaluation of
unconventional therapies in cancer is
a special part of the drug development
program. Within this context the supportive care program of the Center
has a specific focus on nutrition, pain
treatment, and counseling.
